resources.string:
v2.1.9-02
 New Locations: Dauphin County, PA (alt)
 
 Location Fixes:
 Groton, CT merged into New London County, CT
 Carter County, KY
 
 v2.1.9-01
 Added payment menu option to request refund of recent subscription purchase. This should provide some relief for users who are surprised when an old subscription automatically renews.
 
 An alternate version of Cadpage is now available in the Aptoide store that does not require an auxiliary support app to process incoming text messages.
 
 New Locations:
 Cook County, IL (alt)
 Wetzel County, WV
 
 Location Fixes:
 Dallas County, AL
 Sibley County, MN
 DeSoto County, MS
 Phelps County, MO
 Burlington County, NJ
 Benton County, OR
 Charleston County, SC
 
 v2.1.8-03
 New Location:
 Ogemaw County, MI
 
 Location Fixes:
 Merged Keller into Tarrant County, TX
 Sweden
 
 General Fixes:
 Removed all prompts to purchase Cadpage subscriptions when user already has an auto-renewing subscription
 
 v2.1.8-02
 Location Fixes:
 Stanly County, NC
 
 Misc Fixes:
 Notifications could not be turned off for certain setting combinations under Android 10
 
 v2.1.8-01
 Added support for Open Street Maps mapping.
 
 Location Fixes:
 Edgecombe County, NC
 Randolph County, NC
 Stanly County, NC
 
 v2.1.7-20
 New Locations:
 Rio Grande County, CO
 Boundary County, ID
 Cook County, IL (alt)
 
 Location Fixes:
 Phelps County, MO
 Burlington County, NJ
